Class TMModelControlPanel

Localiser.ModelControlPanel
targetMotionOld.dialog.TMModelControlPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
TMDialogComponent
public class TMModelControlPanel extends ModelControlPanel implements TMDialogComponent
Reinstated Target motion add-in as used by the click detector. Hope one day still to replace this with Jamie's new one, but keep this one until Jamie's is working.
Author:
Doug Gillespie
